articles.description: Leading figures from New Zealand, Australia and South Africa queue up to pay tribute to Welsh referee Nigel Owens as he gets ready for his record-breaking 100th Test on Saturday
articles.content:
Some of the biggest names in world rugby have paid personal tributes to Nigel Owens as he prepares for his landmark 100th Test match this weekend.

articles.author: Beren Cross
articles.title: Jack Charlton remembered by Leeds United as Elland Road's East Stand is renamed - Leeds Live
articles.description: Leeds United legend and World Cup winner Jack Charlton has been remembered by the club in a renaming of Elland Road's East Stand after his death earlier this year
articles.content:
Leeds United have renamed Elland Roads East Stand and paid tribute to club icon Jack Charlton.
The 1966 World Cup winner played for the Whites more than anyone in the clubs history and his name will… [+1915 chars]

articles.author: Mark Jones
articles.title: Sir Alex Ferguson pays ultimate compliment to Marcus Rashford as special message sent - Mirror Online
articles.description: The legendary former Manchester United boss has joined forces with Rashford to help him in his ongoing quest to tackle child food poverty
articles.content:
Sir Alex Ferguson says that Marcus Rashford's incredible efforts in helping young people mean that he is now in a position to provide the legendary Scot with advice, not the other way around.

articles.title: Pep Guardiola admits Sergio Aguero is struggling to play after Diego Maradona death - Daily Mail
articles.description: Maradona was Aguero's former father-in-law following his marriage to Gianinna, his youngest daughter, and was grandfather to the Manchester City striker's 11-year-old son, Benjamin.
articles.content:
